Reviews.Content: 3star hotel sign indicates dirty hotel smoking curtains desk burn stains hotel smell tobacco personnel front desk professional qualifications rude obnoxious stayed 3 nights change bed sheets nor cleaned fresh towels hotel desperate renovation hotel centrally located walking tram distance touristic squares shopping center wish night sleep suggest staying cheaper

Reviews.Title: “Cheap, well located and budget”
Reviews.Author: N0rway19
Reviews.Content: hotel cheap located located station amsterdam reseption 247 friendly staff helped book resturant phone etc nice light stayed couple 5 nights own barthroom bathtub shower wc cleaned stay carpet floor previous guests ofcourse bathroom clean towels day bit noisy main road passing quiet night slept trough breakfast served juice bread jam toast etc breakfast included prise til 10 am morning pleasent stayes ive amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “Low standard hotel - fantastic location”
Reviews.Author: Sophia F
Reviews.Content: stayed colleagues reviews expect worst hotel bad reasonable shared triple werent dirty smelly else mentioned revamp price stay hotel amsterdam central station walking distance sights looking location budget choice dont expect wont dissapointed

Reviews.Title: “DISGUSTING!! Rooms, service and price - Rip Off..”

Reviews.Content: charged nearly 300 euro night due conference amsterdam time cant believe ok charging price disgusting dirty bug invested completed 4 weeks backpacking europe worst leaking shower basin carpet damp awful smell fire alarm hanging roof wires dusty hotel staff helpful moved recomend
